data.name: CommonDataObj_Desc_1
data.value: To encourage the use of home batteries, the Flemish government offers a premium to those who buy or lease a home battery. The current premium can be requested until the end of 2021. It will gradually decrease from next year. Below is a table with the amounts. These have been included in your analysis.

data.name: CommonDataObj_Desc_2
data.value: More information about the battery premium can be found at: {link}https://www.vlaanderen.be/premie-voor-deaankoop-of-leasing-van-een-thuismetaal-voor-zelf-opgewekte-energie{/link}.

data.name: Table_Yearly_Subsidies_Maximum_CellData
data.value: [Price], max [Percent]% of the invoice incl. VAT

data.name: Chart_BatterySubsidy_Title
data.value: Investment after deduction of battery subsidy
